translations: 葡萄牙埃斯库多（escudo 的复数）

sentences.sentence: I want to change it into Portuguese escudos.
sentences.translation: 我想把它换成葡萄牙埃斯摩多。

sentences.sentence: This is a 100-dollar note I want to change it into Portugese escudos.
sentences.translation: 这是一张一百美元钞票。我想把它换成葡萄牙埃斯库多。

sentences.sentence: Soon Jonas will have to learn to accept euro coins instead of escudos.
sentences.translation: 牠马上就得学着接受欧元，而不是葡币。
